allow:
Bash(gh pr create --title "docs: remove audit reports and progress artifacts" --body "$\(cat <<''EOF''
## Summary

Remove development artifacts that were incorrectly pushed to remote repository.

## Changes

- Deleted performance analysis reports \(3 files at root\)
- Deleted concurrency audit report
- Deleted implementation status checklist
- Deleted dynamic table growth analysis
- Deleted troubleshooting guide with fixed issues
- Deleted PMD tooling documentation
- Deleted `.opencode/plans` folder \(24 AI-generated plan files\)
- Deleted `docs/archive` folder

**Total: 36 files removed \(8,650 lines\)**

## Preserved

- `docs/BENCHMARK_BASELINES.md` - kept as performance reference documentation

## Motivation

These files were temporary progress reports, audit artifacts, and AI-generated plans created during development. They are not part of the permanent project documentation and should not have been pushed to the remote branch.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
